nodes.text: A mission was undertaken to the fragile world of New Apsolon in 47 BBY by Jedi Masters Qui-Gon Jinn and Tahl to act as mediators to ensure peace whilst forming a government.

The end result saw a Worker, Ewane, elected. Ewane had been renowned as a hero to the Worker people and was thus elected to become the governor of New Apsolon - though the Civilized and the feared Absolutes despised this choice.

Tahl wished to remain on the planet to assist Ewane's two twin daughters, Alani and Eritha, but Jinn argued that their job was finished and they needed to leave. Tahl relented and the two left to leave Ewane begin peacefully ruling his planet.
